summary: Three teenagers live isolated, without leaving their house, because their over-protective parents say they can only leave when their dogtooth falls out.
cast: Christos Stergioglou|Michele Valley|Angeliki Papoulia|Hristos Passalis|Mary Tsoni|Anna Kalaitzidou|Steve Krikris|Sissi Petropoulou|Alexander Voulgaris
keywords: overprotective father|misuse of language|societal ignorance|sadism|child abuse
title: Canino
